message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond your initial assessment.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. Would you consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is significantly below its value.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm sorry, but $11,500 is still above my budget. I would like to stick to my original offer of $8,000 if possible.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I need to get a fair price for this product. Would you be willing to consider $10,000? This is my final offer.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence, but I am unable to go above $8,000 for this product. It seems we're at an impasse. I will consider buying the product from John instead.
